final_jeopardy.category: THE 7 WONDERS OF THE ANCIENT WORLD
final_jeopardy.answer: the Statue of Zeus at Olympia
final_jeopardy.clue: The smallest Ancient Wonder, it was the only one ever moved, having been transported to Constantinople around 391 A.D.
